title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected for the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library.

Observed behavior: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected behavior: When selecting an item in the library outline view, the selected item should be highlighted and the focus should remain on the selected item.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: When selecting an item in the library outline view, the selected item should be highlighted and the focus should remain on the selected item.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library.
